amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Energy to research and develop methods of reducing waste and emissions from advanced battery technology and to increase advanced battery calendar and cycle life.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 111-255 to require the Secretary of Energy to research and develop methods of reducing waste and emissions from advanced battery technology and to increase advanced battery calendar and cycle life.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Altmire amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
